author: The Associated Press
title: AD Haden: Southern California football coach Steve Sarkisian taking leave of absence
text:
 10PM: Sarkisian takes leave of absence at USC 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — AD Haden: Southern California football coach Steve Sarkisian taking leave of absence.
